title: 53 43b 53 "Buggy's Back""The Legend Has Started! Head for the Grand Line!"Transliteration: "Densetsu wa Hajimatta! Mezase Idai Naru Kōro" (Japanese:伝説は始まった!目指せ偉大なる航路) Ken Koyama Michiru Shimada 614.1 January 10, 2001(2001-01-10)[92] July 23, 2005
transformers_text: 53 43 b 53 Buggy's Back The Legend Has Started Head for the Grand Line Transliteration Dense tsu wa Haji matta Meza se Ida i Naru K ro Japanese Ken Koyama Michiru Shimada 614 1 January 10 2001 2001 01 10 92 July 23 2005 Miraculously saved from death by an unnatural green gust and a lightning bolt to Buggy the Straw Hats rush out of Logue town only for Zoro to be stopped by T as hig i and Luffy to be stopped by Captain Smoker and saved by Dragon The Straw Hats are able to escape Logue town and proclaim why they are going to the Grand Line Sanji to find the All Blue Luffy to become King of the Pirates Zoro to become the greatest swordsman in the world Nami to chart a map of the entire world and Us opp to become a brave warrior of the sea
